---
order: 5
title: Colored Text
---

In the article, you can change the color of some text. To add one, click *Edit Markdown* in the right panel and enter the code.Â Using the construction `[color:<color>]`, where `color` is represented in hex format.

-  Markdown code: `[color:#FF0000] text [/color]`

-  Result: [color:#FF0000] text [/color]
